Subscriptions & purchases

  • Will I be charged twice if I delete or lose an issue?
  • Will I be charged twice if I delete or lose an issue and re-install it?
  • When my digital subscription expires, do I keep the issues?
  • I'm not a subscriber, can I still purchase the issues as and when they become available?
  • If I make an in app purchase or subscribe on my iPad, can I access the content on my iPhone?
  • I have a print subscription. Can I transfer it?
  • How do I restore my previous purchases?

  • Do I get any cover mounted extras?

Will I be charged twice if I delete or lose an issue?

No. Any previous purchases you have made will be recorded in your purchase history. Please see “How do I restore my previous purchases”.

Already tried this?

Contact support using any of the options below.

  • Phone
  • Email

Will I be charged twice if I delete or lose an issue and re-install it?

No. Any previous purchases you have made will be recorded in your purchase history so we will know that you have already bought the issue and therefore you will never be charged twice for the same issue. The App itself is free to download.

Already tried this?

Contact support using any of the options below.

  • Phone
  • Email

When my digital subscription expires, do I keep the issues?

Yes. The issues will always belong to you, but in general they will be restricted to the platform (iOS/Android) on which you purchased them.

Already tried this?

Contact support using any of the options below.

  • Phone
  • Email

I'm not a subscriber, can I still purchase the issues as and when they become available?

The App is free for everyone to download. To download single issues within the App as and when they become available, you can pay a single issue price.

Already tried this?

Contact support using any of the options below.

  • Phone
  • Email

If I make an in app purchase or subscribe on my iPad, can I access the content on my iPhone?

Yes, if you subscribe on your iPad for example, you simply need to download the free app on your iPhone using the same Appe ID and you will be given access to any purchases made under that Apple ID.

Note: you may need to Restore Purchases.

Already tried this?

Contact support using any of the options below.

  • Phone
  • Email

I have a print subscription. Can I transfer it?

In most cases you can transfer a print subscription to digital. Please email customer support by following the instructions at the top of this page and provide your subscription number and account details.

Already tried this?

Contact support using any of the options below.

  • Phone
  • Email

How do I restore my previous purchases?

Any previous purchases you have made will be tied your Apple ID. You can restore your previous purchases at any time.

  1. Open the App menu
  2. Tap ‘Manage AcAccount’
  3. Tap ‘Restore Purchases’ and enter your password

Already tried this?

Contact support using any of the options below.

  • Phone
  • Email

How do I download the latest issue as part of my subscription?

You’ll need to download new issues each month as they become available in the App. We will send a message to notify you when new issues are available, providing you have ‘Notifications’ turned on in your device’s Settings’.

Already tried this?

Contact support using any of the options below.

  • Phone
  • Email

How can I claim a refund if I'm not happy with something I've purchased?

If you’re not happy with one of our products we would really like to know about it. Please contact us using the Support form (instructions at the top of this page), we will try to either fix the problem or provide you with a satisfactory replacement. If you would still just prefer a refund we can provide advice on how to claim a refund from Apple.

Already tried this?

Contact support using any of the options below.

  • Phone
  • Email

Do I get instant access to the magazine when I subscribe?

Yes, you get instant access to the latest issue published at the time of purchase. However, if you purchased your subscription online from buysubscriptions.com it may take up to 24 hours for your subscription to become active.

Already tried this?

Contact support using any of the options below.

  • Phone
  • Email

Do I get any cover mounted extras?

Unfortunately, due to costs and logistics, no cover mounts or free gifts are available with digital editions.

Already tried this?

Contact support using any of the options below.

  • Phone
  • Email

Can I access the digital editions for free if I am already a print subscriber?

Unfortunately there is no free access to the digital editions as part of a print subscription. In the future we hope to offer this function so that you can upgrade your subscription to enjoy both editions.

Already tried this?

Contact support using any of the options below.

  • Phone
  • Email
